name: RYAN_WHITE_RSR_DATA
description: This table contains the basic information from Ryan White abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: CUR_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: The current state of the registry record

columns.name: RYN_WHT_REPORT_YEAR
columns.description: The Ryan White reporting year.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_REG_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique provider registration code that is automatically generated when the provider is entered into the RSR Web system provider directory.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_UNIQUE_CLIENT_ID
columns.description: The encrypted, unique client identifier generated by the HAB Unique Client Identifier (UCI) generation utilities.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_ENROLL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's enrollment status in the Ryan White program at the end of the reporting period.
entries: Referred to another program or services, or self-sufficient
Removed from treatment due to violation of rules

columns.name: RYN_WHT_BIRTH_YEAR
columns.description: The patient's year of birth.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_ETHNICITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's ethnicity

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SEX_AT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description: The biological sex assigned to the patient at birth.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_CURRENT_GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's current gender.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_FPL_PERCENT
columns.description: The annual household income of the patient being reported to the Ryan White program.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HOUSING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Patient's housing status at the end of the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIVAIDSSTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Patient's HIV/AIDS status at the end of the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_DX_YEAR
columns.description: The year of the patient's HIV diagnosis.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_RISK_SCR_PROV_YN
columns.description: Did the patient receive risk reduction screening/counseling during this reporting period?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_FIRST_AMB_DATE
columns.description: Date of patient's first ambulatory care date at this provider agency. This value must be on or before the last date of the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PRESC_PCP_PRLX_C_NAME
columns.description: Was the patient prescribed PCP Prophylaxis anytime during this reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PRESC_ART_C_NAME
columns.description: Was the patient prescribed Antiretroviral Therapy(ART) anytime during this reporting period.
entries: No, not ready (as determined by clinician)

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_TB_C_NAME
columns.description: Has the patient been screened for TB since his/her HIV diagnosis.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_SYPHILIS_C_NAME
columns.description: Was the patient screened for syphilis during this reporting period? Exclude if under the age of 18 and not sexually active.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_HEP_B_C_NAME
columns.description: Has the patient been screened for Hepatitis B since his/her HIV diagnosis?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_VACC_HEP_B_C_NAME
columns.description: Has the patient completed the vaccine series for Hepatitis B?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_HEP_C_C_NAME
columns.description: Has the patient been screened for Hepatitis C since his/her HIV diagnosis?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SCR_SBST_ABUSE_C_NAME
columns.description: Was the patient screened for substance abuse during the reporting period?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_MENTAL_SCR_C_NAME
columns.description: Was the patient screened for mental health during the reporting period?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_RECV_PAP_SMEAR_C_NAME
columns.description: Did the patient receive a cervical pap smear during the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PREGNANT_C_NAME
columns.description: Was the patient pregnant during the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_POS_DATE
columns.description: Date of patient's last confidential confirmatory HIV test with a positive result within the reporting period.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_OAMC_LINK_DATE
columns.description: Date of patient's first Outpatient Ambulatory Medical Care (OAMC) visit after positive HIV test.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The unique provider organization identifier assigned through the Ryan White HIV/AIDS Program Data Report (RDR) or RSR Web application.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_VITAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Holds the vital status of a Ryan White patient.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HOUSING_DATE
columns.description: Holds date of collection of housing status for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RW_NEW_CLIENT_YN
columns.description: Holds whether the patient is new to this provider.

columns.name: RW_SERV_PREV_YEAR_YN
columns.description: Holds whether the patient received services in the previous year.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_CW_ENROLL_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Ryan White client enrollment status

columns.name: RYN_WHT_ENROLL_DATE
columns.description: Ryan White enrollment date

columns.name: RYN_WHT_CASE_CLOSED_DATE
columns.description: The date the Ryan White case was closed.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_AIDS_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the patient was first diagnosed with AIDS

columns.name: RYN_WHT_AIDS_DATE_EST_YN
columns.description: Is the date of first AIDS diagnosis an estimate?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_ART_RX_DATE
columns.description: The date ART medication was first prescribed to the patient.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_ADAP_APP_DATE
columns.description: Date of the ADAP application for the patient.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the patient was first diagnosed with HIV

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_DATE_EST_YN
columns.description: Is the date of first HIV diagnosis an estimate?

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HOUSEHOLD_INCOME
columns.description: The patient's household income for Ryan White reporting

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HOUSEHOLD_SIZE
columns.description: The number of people in the patient's household for Ryan White reporting

columns.name: RYN_WHT_POVERTY_LEVEL_DATE
columns.description: The date of the poverty level assessment for Ryan White reporting

columns.name: RYN_WHT_INDIVIDUAL_INCOME
columns.description: The patient's individual income for Ryan White reporting

columns.name: RYN_WHT_PRE_ART_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason ART medication was not prescribed to the patient.
entries: Treatment not medically indicated per guidelines
Client not ready (as determined by clinician)
Other extenuating circumstances (e.g. inadequate insurance, ability to pay)

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SUBSTANCE_ABUSE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the value for the Ryan White Substance Abuse annual review screening.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_SUBSTANCE_ABUSE_DT
columns.description: The date on whice the Ryan White substance abuse annual review screening took place.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_MENTAL_HEALTH_C_NAME
columns.description: The result of the Ryan White annual review mental health screening.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_MENTAL_HEALTH_DT
columns.description: The date on which the Ryan White annual review mental health screening took place.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_RISK_COUNS_YN
columns.description: The result of the Ryan White annual review risk reduction counseling screening.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_RRC_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the Ryan White annual review HIV risk reduction counseling took place.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_RRC_CNS_BY_C_NAME
columns.description: Enter who did the couseling for the Ryan White annual review HIV risk reduction counseling screening.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_PRIM_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: The result of the Ryan White annual review HIV primary care screening.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_HIV_PC_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the Ryan White annual review HIV primary care screening took place.
